ElementSetAttributeNodeNS.summary: The setAttributeNodeNS() method of the interface adds a new namespaced node to an element.

remarks.para: If you don't need to work with the attribute node (such as cloning from another element) before adding it, you can use the method instead.
If you are working with HTML documents and you don't need to specify the requested attribute as being part of a specific namespace, use the method instead.

ElementSetAttributeNodeNS.returns: The replaced attribute node, if any, returned by this function.
